Class ServiceBuilder

Creates {@link remote.DriverService} instances that manage a ChromeDriver server.

Hierarchy

  • <internal>.Builder
    • ServiceBuilder

Constructors

constructor

  • new ServiceBuilder(opt_exe?: string): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Overrides Builder.constructor

    throws

    {Error} If provided executable does not exist, or the chromedriver cannot be found on the PATH.

    Parameters

    • Optional opt_exe: string

      Path to the server executable to use. If omitted, the builder will attempt to locate the chromedriver on the current PATH.

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

loggingTo

  • loggingTo(path: string): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Sets the path of the log file the driver should log to. If a log file is not specified, the driver will log to stderr.

    Parameters

    • path: string

      Path of the log file to use.

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.

setAdbPort

  • setAdbPort(port: number): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Sets which port adb is listening to. The ChromeDriver will connect to adb if an {@linkplain Options#androidPackage Android session} is requested, but adb must be started beforehand.

    Parameters

    • port: number

      Which port adb is running on.

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.

setEnvironment

  • setEnvironment(env: Map<string, string> | {}): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Inherited from Builder.setEnvironment

    Defines the environment to start the server under. This setting will be inherited by every browser session started by the server. By default, the server will inherit the enviroment of the current process.

    Parameters

    • env: Map<string, string> | {}

      The desired environment to use, or null if the server should inherit the current environment.

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.

setHostname

  • setHostname(hostname: string): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Inherited from Builder.setHostname

    Sets the host name to access the server on. If specified, the {@linkplain #setLoopback() loopback} setting will be ignored.

    Parameters

    • hostname: string

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.

setLoopback

  • setLoopback(loopback: boolean): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Inherited from Builder.setLoopback

    Sets whether the service should be accessed at this host's loopback address.

    Parameters

    • loopback: boolean

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.

setNumHttpThreads

  • setNumHttpThreads(n: number): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Sets the number of threads the driver should use to manage HTTP requests. By default, the driver will use 4 threads.

    Parameters

    • n: number

      The number of threads to use.

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.

setPath

  • setPath(basePath: string): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Inherited from Builder.setPath

    Sets the base path for WebDriver REST commands (e.g. "/wd/hub"). By default, the driver will accept commands relative to "/".

    Parameters

    • basePath: string

      The base path to use, or null to use the default.

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.

setPort

  • setPort(port: number): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Inherited from Builder.setPort

    Sets the port to start the server on.

    throws

    {Error} If an invalid port is specified.

    Parameters

    • port: number

      The port to use, or 0 for any free port.

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.

setStdio

  • setStdio(config: any): <internal>.ServiceBuilder

  • Inherited from Builder.setStdio

    IO configuration for the spawned server process. For more information, refer to the documentation of child_process.spawn.

    see

    https://nodejs.org/dist/latest-v4.x/docs/api/child_process.html#child_process_options_stdio

    Parameters

    • config: any

      The desired IO configuration.

    Returns <internal>.ServiceBuilder

    A self reference.
